trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.alarm.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}=0 or ({Template APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.temperature.value.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}>=({Template APC NetBotz Rack Monitor 250:apc.enviro.sensor.wireless.temperature.threshold.max.["{#SNMPINDEX}"].last()}+{$HYSTERESIS}))
trigger_prototype.name: {#SNMPVALUE} {ITEM.LASTVALUE} :: Temperature > Max Threshold
